thread.title: BlackBerry to acquire Good Technology for $425 million
thread.title_full: BlackBerry to acquire Good Technology for $425 million

title: BlackBerry to acquire Good Technology for $425 million
text:
Related: Tech, Deals BlackBerry to acquire Good Technology for $425 million A Blackberry sign is seen in front of their offices on the day of their annual general meeting for shareholders in Waterloo, Canada June 23, 2015. Reuters/Mark Blinch 
Canadian smartphone maker BlackBerry Ltd said it would acquire software security provider Good Technology for $425 million in cash. 
BlackBerry said it expects to realize about $160 million in revenue from the acquisition in the first year once the deal closes. 
(Reporting by Anannya Pramanick in Bengaluru; Editing by Anil D'Silva) 
Our top photos from the last 24 hours. Slideshow Trending On Reuters
